TEKsystems® is the nation’s leading technology staffing and services company. Combining a proven track record of superior performance, a quality-focused approach to service delivery, and the highest-caliber technical professionals in the market, TEKsystems helps our clients successfully plan, build, and run their critical technology initiatives.With more than 25 years of experience, we annually deploy 70,000 technical professionals from 90 locations throughout North America, Europe, and Asia. Our capabilities include IT and communications staff augmentation and direct placement services; managed, project-based, and outsourced applications and infrastructure services; education services; and comprehensive workforce management solutions.Specialties: TEKsystems provides technical staff augmentation and direct placement services, as well as full management of outsourced projects, technical education services, and comprehensive workforce management solutions. I particularly specialize in healthcare IT staffing.

Prabhudas Lilladhar, from its humble beginnings as a standalone brokerage firm in 1944 to offering the entire range of financial products and services through a nationwide presence, the Group has come a long way. Built on the core values of Integrity, Enterprise, Responsiveness, Expertise and Ambition, today PL is amongst India's leading Institutional broking services providers. With a nationwide presence of over 330+ centers, on-panel financial experts, best-in-class Research Lab, global standard modules and seamless technology interface, the Group is on an ambitious growth track. The Group is driving financial growth for a diverse set of clientele including FIIs, HNIs, Institutions, Corporate and Retail Investors.I worked there as portfolio manager for HNI clients to provide sound financial advice and portfolio restructuring backed by strong fundamental and technical research to increase profitability and decrease market risks.

summary: My aim is to work in professional environment where my knowledge will be utilized to the maximum. I have a PGDM-Finance degree from Institute of Finance and International Management, Bangalore with 8 months experience as portfolio manager.Summary:•Good understanding of  various techniques of sourcing and identifying potentially good candidates.•Expert in finding the right candidate for the job using different skills & resources like networking, head hunting, referrals & Job boards.•Responsible for sourcing/recruiting professionals to US clients based on various requirements.•Extensive knowledge in dealing with HNI Clients.•Well versed with tehcnical analysis, fundamental analysis and portfolio management techniques.•Working closely with teams to ensure the delivery of knowledge from research team to the clients.•Responsible for daily mailers on markets and various other summaries of reserach reports.
